title: Add read operation types to comms/types.ts
description:
Add/re-export these types from api/ticks.ts to comms/types.ts:
- InfoResponse (repo name, epics)
- Activity (activity feed entry)
- RunRecord (completed run data)
- RunStatusResponse (live run status)
- TickDetail (tick with notesList, blockerDetails)

These types are needed for the new read operations in CommsClient.
acceptance_criteria: Types compile and are exported from comms/index.ts
closed_reason: Types re-exported from api/ticks.ts to comms/types.ts and comms/index.ts. Build passes.
